solution_line_template: The dog runs {dog_speed_mpm} miles per minute because {dog_speed_mph} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{dog_speed_mph}/{minutes_per_hour}={dog_speed_mpm}>>{dog_speed_mpm}
The rabbit runs {rabbit_speed_mpm} miles per minute because {rabbit_speed_mph} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{rabbit_speed_mph}/{minutes_per_hour}={rabbit_speed_mpm}>>{rabbit_speed_mpm}
